thread.title: Sasso Marconi, another defeat. The push doesn't pay off - Quotidiano Sportivo
thread.title_full: Sasso Marconi, another defeat. The push doesn't pay off - Quotidiano Sportivo

author: Quotidiano Sportivo
title: Sasso Marconi, another defeat. The push doesn't pay off - Quotidiano Sportivo
text:
Sasso Marconi, another defeat. The push doesn't bear fruit. After the defeat in Pistoia, Farneti's team lost at home to Trevigliese. Montalbano's goal proved decisive just minutes from the end. di NICOLA BALDINI September 25, 2025 Saturday's league match between Pistoiese and Sasso Marconi ended 3-0.
by Nicola BaldiniSASSO MARCONIThe first midweek round does not bring good luck to the Sasso Marconi di Frank Farneti which, at the 'Carbonchi', fell 1-0 against its direct rival for the salvation Trevigliese. The match was decided, a few minutes before the final whistle, by a diagonal shot from Montalbano , with the yellow and blues who, now having put this bitter defeat behind them, will begin today to prepare in the best possible way for the delicate match scheduled for Sunday on the Palazzolo pitch.
But getting to the match report, Farneti's men started strongly, and in the sixth minute, a fine low shot from the edge of the box by Marra was saved by Illipronti with a dive. Five minutes later, the visiting goalkeeper failed to handle a cross from the left by Ghebreselassie, but did well to anticipate the usual Marra just as he was about to strike. In the 14th minute, at the other end, Pesenti headed well, but Albieri was alert to tip the ball into a corner. Ten minutes later, another superb save from the Sasso team prevented Montalbano's shot from the edge of the box from going into the back of the net.
In the 35th minute, after Pesenti's free kick went just wide, Sasso missed a sensational opportunity to take the lead: Ghebreselassie opened the gap on the right and crossed to Leonardi, who, all alone, incredibly fired wide. In the second half, the home side's intensity slowed, with Trevigliese managing to gain ground as the minutes passed and, consequently, posing several threats in the opponent's penalty area.
In the 9th minute, Del Carro had a go (a header controlled by Albieri), in the 12th Montalbano's shot went wide, and in the 19th Brambilla's shot went wide. In the 27th minute, the visitors came very close to making it 1-0 with a 25-meter shot from Montalbano that, after hitting the underside of the crossbar, bounced off the line without going over. Two minutes later, Vinzioli's easy tap-in was blocked by the excellent Albieri.
The away pressure became exhausting, and in the 41st minute, Tricarico's team finally found the net that would decide the match: once again, the unleashed Montalbano unleashed a diagonal shot that left the home goalkeeper with no chance. In the closing stages, Sasso pressed for an equalizer, but Leonardi's shot and then Galassi's header were easily controlled.
